Name: Minecraft Java: NeoForgeMC
Description: NeoForge MC is a powerful modding framework for Minecraft, enabling extensive customization and expansion of the game. It provides a robust API for developers to create mods, adding new features, mechanics, and content. Known for its wide mod compatibility and active community, NeoForge MC is a preferred choice for players and server administrators looking to enhance their Minecraft experience with diverse, community-created mods.
Author: info@hydren.us.kg
